about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My passion for digital art and creativity
about.name: Sara De Masi ðŸŒ¸
about.description1: Hi! My name is Sara, I am an illustrator, and I love drawing characters inspired by the world of anime and fantasy.
about.description2: Ever since I was little, I have always loved drawing, and fascinated by art and the beauty it conceals, I have continued to give free rein to my creativity. When I draw, I like to play with shades and create clean, rounded lines to enhance every detail and make the drawing striking.
about.description3: Each project is an opportunity for me to tell a story, capture emotions, and create something truly special. I love working closely with my clients to bring their artistic visions to life.
